enemy.name: cougar
enemy.description: An infernal being with unnatural cravings for blood.
enemy.attackMessage: is struck by the cougar's fierce claws
enemy.postMortem: Evil glow fades from the cougar's eyes.

enemy.name: infernal cougar
enemy.description: Some malevolent force has corrupted this cougar.
enemy.attackMessage: is bit by the infernal cougar
enemy.postMortem: With malignant screams, the infernal cougar's soul is put back to rest.
enemy.goryPostMortem: The infernal cougar is banished back to hell.
